title: Greg Played Marvel's Avengers War For Wakanda! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.13.21
description:
Blessing and Greg dive into Avenger's Black Panther expansion preview impressions, Xbox Game Pass not coming to Switch anytime soon, and NPD numbers!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:09:00 - Housekeeping
Monday, Kinda Funny’s hosting the Marvel’s Avengers War for Wakanda Launch Party! Starting at 10 am PT over on twitch.tv/crystaldynamics, Greg and Ms. Marvel herself Sandra Saad (Sod) will be hosting two hours of gameplay, dev insight, and cast interviews. Yes, Black Panther himself Christopher Judge will be there, and you should, too! Monday at 10 am PT on twitch.tv/crystaldynamics!
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:12:18 - Marvel’s Avengers War for Wakanda Preview round up
00:34:25 - Ad
00:35:30 - Xbox has ruled out Game Pass on other consoles in near future - Tom Ivan@ Video Games Chronicle
00:40:23 - We got NPD for July! - Sherif Saed @ VG247
00:45:10 -WWE 2K22 has reportedly been ‘completely rebuilt’ and is ‘looking fantastic’ - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:56:06 -We’re getting a new Pokémon Presents stream next week! - Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:58:37 - Out today
01:01:00 - Squad Up:Dan “Golden Spider”(PS5 (or 4!)) - Goldenspider666
01:01:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:
Mon: Blessing and Tim
Tues: Janet and Gary
Wed: Blessing and Andy
Thurs: Tim and Tam
Fri: Greg and Ryan Penagos
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
